title: Can't buy RP with any type of card
body: I have been trying all day today to buy $10 of RP and it tells me every time to come back and try again later someone have an answer?

replies.body: That's strange, I haven't seen any issues with purchasing RP.  Due to the sensitive nature of account and billing info, it's not something we can assist with here on the boards.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can take a look into your specific case to see what's up.  Hang tight until then!
